brainly_data.question:
A poem describes a heroic girl escaping danger. One verse of the poem describes her as a "teenage Lara Croft." Lara Croft is an athletic and intelligent video game character who explores dangerous tombs and ancient ruins. What type of allusion does the author create?

Biblical
Historical
Mythological
Pop culture
brainly_data.subject: Social studies

all_answers.question:
A poem describes a heroic girl escaping danger. One verse of the poem describes her as a "teenage Lara Croft." Lara Croft is an athletic and intelligent video game character who explores dangerous tombs and ancient ruins. What type of allusion does the author create?

Biblical
Historical
Mythological
Pop culture
all_answers.subject: Social studies
all_answers.text: The author is making a cultural allusion, therefore  comparing the character to something in our present day culture. I hope this will guide you towards the right answer.

all_answers.text:
Historical is the right answer!~

Hope I helped out your grade!~
